_comment_GLOBAL: Main configuration file for Apartment Market Analyzer. Modify these values to adjust the application behavior without needing to change the Python code.

scraper._comment: Settings for the data collection script (web scraper).
scraper._comment_num_pages: Change this to limit how many pages the scraper fetches. Increase for more data, decrease for faster testing/debugging.
scraper._comment_delay_seconds: Random delay range between individual requests. Keeps the bot stealthy and avoids IP bans.

driver._comment: Selenium WebDriver setup for the Chrome browser automation.
driver._comment_headless: Change to true if you want the browser to run invisibly in the background. False is recommended to manually handle cookie dialogs.
driver.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

paths._comment: File paths used across the application. Only change these if you restructure the project folders.

app._comment: Settings for the graphical user interface (GUI).
app.title: Real Estate Market Analyzer - Apartmány

theme._comment: Colors used in the application. You can safely change these using standard Hex color codes (e.g., #FFFFFF for white).

future_trend._comment: Default parameters for the future property value prediction graph.
future_trend._comment_years: How many years into the future the graph should forecast.
future_trend._comment_growth_rate: Expected annual growth rate. 0.04 represents 4% compounding growth per year.

area_limits._comment: Validation thresholds for the GUI input to prevent nonsensical combinations. Format: [minimum_area, maximum_area] in m2. Change these if the app falsely blocks legitimate inputs.

model._comment: Machine learning model parameters, dataset boundaries, and metadata mappings.

training._comment: Settings applied during model training via train_model.py.
training._comment_min_price: Minimum genuine price threshold. Filters out corrupted data or rental prices incorrectly scraped as sale prices.
training._comment_rf_n_estimators: Number of decision trees inside the Random Forest algorithm. Increase (e.g., 200, 300) for better accuracy at the cost of slower training.

city_to_region._comment: Dictionary used to map specific city names found in ad titles into their respective main regions. You can add more cities here to improve data parsing precision.

disposition_mapping._comment: Mapping of human-readable layouts (keys) to model column names (values). DO NOT change the values without retraining the model.
